# Self-defined Functions

<div class="left">

## R

```{r}
square = function(x){
  return(x ** 2)
}

square(10)
```
</div>

<div class="right">

## Python

```{python}
def square(x):
    new_value = x ** 2
    return new_value
    
square(10)
```

</div>
